item.title: Benefits & Features
item.description: Benefits HR is all about people, not pushing paper. Do you routinely hire hundreds of people in just a matter of weeks and deal with a mountain of paperwork during onboarding? Do you spend seemingly never ending days chasing paperwork – making sure employee forms are complete, entering data into your system, and then filing them in a safe place? You’re not alone. Each year, US employers spend an astonishing $5.
